interpretation:
The "person with skullcap" emoji represents a wise and respected elder. This individual has a wealth of knowledge and experience that they are willing to share with those who seek their guidance. They have a deep understanding of the world around them and are able to offer valuable insights into life's mysteries. The skullcap symbolizes their dedication to spiritual pursuits and their connection to the divine. 

This card suggests seeking out the advice of someone who has lived a long and fulfilling life. They may be able to offer a perspective that is different from your own and help you gain a deeper understanding of yourself and the world. Alternatively, this card may be a reminder to honor the wisdom that comes with age and to be open to learning from those who have come before us.
